name: FSTAB wizard
short_description:
FSTAB wizard, a small script to facilitate the setup of /etc/fstab on linux systems. 

Check the wiki for instructions to use.

Developed as part of the NAZverryPie package, a user friendly installer for turning your Raspberry Pie into a home-user NAS.

The script is aimed at helping users that would like to setup the terminal based Pi (and/or other systems) without having to deep dive into vi, chmod and other fine tools.

Developed with the help of lots of knowledge available on the web, especially stackoverflow.com.
summary: FSTAB wizard - script to facilitate the setup of fstab
